Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 39 points in 29 minutes
Isaiah Joe added 23 of his 31 points in the first half
Oklahoma City had a 36-12 run in the first half en route to a 70-43 lead
The Thunder had the game in hand by halftime
Oklahoma City closed the first quarter with a 12-0 spurt to lead 31-17
The Thunder then unleashed a 19-5 run over more than six minutes of the second to extend a 12-point lead to 55-29
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks' fourth loss in five games
The Knicks were booed multiple times in the first half of perhaps the low point of their season
The Knicks had an 0-for-9 night by Mikal Bridges
The Thunder outscored the Knicks 68-36 over consecutive quarters
Miscellaneous Highlights: There was no hangover at Madison Square Garden
The game took place on January 10, 2025
The Knicks host Milwaukee on Sunday
The Thunder visit Washington that night
